title: minecraft dynmap 怎么设置？
author: mayichong
txt_content: 水桶服务器，怎么设置dynmap？去哪个网页才能看到游戏卫星画面？需要设置什么吗？求解答！

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
http://forums.bukkit.org/threads ... raft-maps-1060.489/

https://github.com/webbukkit/dynmap/wiki/Configuration
How to configure separate webservers
https://github.com/webbukkit/dynmap/wiki
Dynmap Commands
https://github.com/webbukkit/dynmap/wiki/Commands

replies.txt_content: https://github.com/webbukkit/dynmap/wiki 这里 谷歌是你的朋友
